content: NEW YORK  Nov 8 American Electric Power  one of the largest utilities in the United States  narrowed its 2016 operating earnings guidance on Sunday and forecast that it would invest $13 billion to strengthen its regulated business through 2018.
name: American Electric Power Company Inc
title: AEP narrows 2016 guidance range  to invest $13 bln through 2018
